name: Temple Raiders
description:
Temple Raiders is a prototype I made in 2 days to get ideas. It's a 2 player local co-op puzzle/racing game . It doesn't have any audio. The game is a bit too hard, I didn't have time to test it a lot with the short deadline I gave myself.

How To Play

Be the first to reach the golden idol.

Controls
  • Player 1 : WASD
  • Player 2 : Arrows

---

Mostly made with Godot 3.2.1 and Aseprite.
